title: health_status_endpoint_verification
description: Verify the /health GET endpoint returns a 200 OK status indicating the service is live and operational.

title: readiness_status_endpoint_verification
description: Verify the /ready GET endpoint returns a 200 Ready status indicating the service is ready to accept requests.

title: user_registration_endpoint_validation
description: Test the /api/v1/auth/register POST endpoint for successful user registration with valid data and proper handling of invalid input resulting in 400 Bad Request.

title: user_login_endpoint_authentication
description: Test the /api/v1/auth/login POST endpoint for successful user login with valid credentials and proper handling of unauthorized access with 401 status.

title: token_refresh_endpoint_functionality
description: Verify the /api/v1/auth/refresh POST endpoint correctly refreshes JWT tokens and handles unauthorized requests appropriately.

title: user_profile_access_with_authentication
description: Test the /api/v1/profile GET endpoint to ensure it returns user profile data when accessed with valid JWT token and returns 401 Unauthorized otherwise.

title: message_verification_endpoint_functionality
description: Test the /api/v1/verify POST endpoint to verify message fraud detection functionality, including response with fraud probability and handling of rate limiting with 429 status.

title: verification_history_access_with_authentication
description: Test the /api/v1/verify/history GET endpoint to ensure it returns verification history data when accessed with valid JWT token and handles unauthorized access with 401 status.

title: report_creation_and_listing_with_authentication
description: Test the /api/v1/reports POST endpoint for creating reports with valid authentication and the GET endpoint for listing reports, ensuring unauthorized access is handled with 401 status.

title: ml_prediction_endpoint_accuracy_and_performance
description: Test the /api/v1/predict POST endpoint to verify the model inference service returns accurate fraud detection predictions within the required latency constraints.
